brokenspace_bellow.name: Broken-Space Bellow
brokenspace_bellow.text: Once during your turn, you may take a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

buggy_evolution.name: Buggy Evolution
buggy_evolution.text: Whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, put a random card from your deck that evolves from this Pokémon onto this Pokémon to evolve it.

catching_tail.name: Catching Tail
catching_tail.text: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon Tool card from your deck into your hand.

celestial_blessing.name: Celestial Blessing
celestial_blessing.text: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

check.name: CHECK
check.text: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to it, it is now Asleep.

combust.name: Combust
combust.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a [R] Energy from your discard pile to this Pokémon. If you do, do 20 damage to this Pokémon.

comforting_song.name: Comforting Song
comforting_song.text: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon.

counterattack.name: Counterattack
counterattack.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

crystal_body.name: Crystal Body
crystal_body.text: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon.

cunning_link.name: Cunning Link
cunning_link.text: Once during your turn, if you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, you may do 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

dark_chase.name: Dark Chase
dark_chase.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

data_scan.name: Data Scan
data_scan.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck.

defensive_whirlwind.name: Defensive Whirlwind
defensive_whirlwind.text: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from [F] Pokémon.

drive_off.name: Drive Off
drive_off.text: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

en_fruits_iastic.name: En-fruits-iastic
en_fruits_iastic.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less [G] Energy.

energy_plunder.name: Energy Plunder
energy_plunder.text: Once during your turn, you may move all [D] Energy from each of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

exoskeleton.name: Exoskeleton
exoskeleton.text: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

fabled_luster.name: Fabled Luster
fabled_luster.text: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

fantastical_floating.name: Fantastical Floating
fantastical_floating.text: If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

fighting_coach.name: Fighting Coach
fighting_coach.text: Attacks used by your [F] Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
fire_breath.text: Once during your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned.

flower_shield.name: Flower Shield
flower_shield.text: Each of your Pokémon that has any [P] Energy attached recovers from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

fluffy_flight.name: Fluffy Flight
fluffy_flight.text: Your Active Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

forest_breath.name: Forest Breath
forest_breath.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a [G] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your [G] Pokémon.

fragrance_trap.name: Fragrance Trap
fragrance_trap.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, once during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot.

fragrant_flower_garden.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
fragrant_flower_garden.text: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

fullmouth_manner.name: Full-Mouth Manner
fullmouth_manner.text: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, heal 20 damage from it.

fur_coat.name: Fur Coat
fur_coat.text: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

gas_leak.name: Gas Leak
gas_leak.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

guard.name: GUARD
guard.text: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than GUARD. All of your Pokémon take −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

guard_dog_visage.name: Guard Dog Visage
guard_dog_visage.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon cost 1 [C] more.

guarded_grill.name: Guarded Grill
guarded_grill.text: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.

guts.name: Guts
guts.text: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

happy_ribbon.name: Happy Ribbon
happy_ribbon.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may draw 2 cards.

hard_coat.name: Hard Coat
hard_coat.text: This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

heal_block.name: Heal Block
heal_block.text: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be healed.

healing_ripples.name: Healing Ripples
healing_ripples.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may heal 60 damage from 1 of your [W] Pokémon.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.text: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

illusive_trickery.name: Illusive Trickery
illusive_trickery.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this Pokémon's attacks, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

infiltrating_inspection.name: Infiltrating Inspection
infiltrating_inspection.text: Once during your turn, when you put this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may have your opponent reveal their hand.

innards_out.name: Innards Out
innards_out.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 50 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

intimidating_fang.name: Intimidating Fang
intimidating_fang.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon do −20 damage.

jungle_totem.name: Jungle Totem
jungle_totem.text: Each [G] Energy attached to your [G] Pokémon provides 2 [G] Energy. This effect doesn't stack.

legendary_pulse.name: Legendary Pulse
legendary_pulse.text: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw a card.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.text: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

lordly_cheering.name: Lordly Cheering
lordly_cheering.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Poliwhirl do +40 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

lunar_plumage.name: Lunar Plumage
lunar_plumage.text: Whenever you attach a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

melodious_healing.name: Melodious Healing
melodious_healing.text: Once during your turn, you may heal 30 damage from each of your [W] Pokémon.

more_poison.name: More Poison
more_poison.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon takes +10 damage from being Poisoned.

nightmare_aura.name: Nightmare Aura
nightmare_aura.text: Whenever you attach a [D] Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

offload_pass.name: Offload Pass
offload_pass.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move all [F] Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

perish_body.name: Perish Body
perish_body.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

poison_coating.name: Poison Coating
poison_coating.text: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

powder_heal.name: Powder Heal
powder_heal.text: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

power.name: POWER
power.text: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than POWER. Attacks used by your Pokémon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

power_link.name: Power Link
power_link.text: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

primeval_law.name: Primeval Law
primeval_law.text: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from their hand to evolve their Active Pokémon.

psy_shadow.name: Psy Shadow
psy_shadow.text: Once during your turn, you may take a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the [P] Pokémon in the Active Spot.

psychic_connect.name: Psychic Connect
psychic_connect.text: Once during your turn, you may move all [P] Energy from 1 of your Benched [P] Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

psychic_healing.name: Psychic Healing
psychic_healing.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

reckless_shearing.name: Reckless Shearing
reckless_shearing.text: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

resilience_link.name: Resilience Link
resilience_link.text: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

retreat_directive.name: Retreat Directive
retreat_directive.text: Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost.

rising_road.name: Rising Road
rising_road.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

rough_skin.name: Rough Skin
rough_skin.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon [ex].

shadow_void.name: Shadow Void
shadow_void.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon that has damage on it, and move all of its damage to this Pokémon.

shadowy_spellbind.name: Shadowy Spellbind
shadowy_spellbind.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.

shell_armor.name: Shell Armor
shell_armor.text: This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attacks.

sky_support.name: Sky Support
sky_support.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokemon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.

sleep_pendulum.name: Sleep Pendulum
sleep_pendulum.text: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

snowy_terrain.name: Snowy Terrain
snowy_terrain.text: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

solid_shell.name: Solid Shell
solid_shell.text: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

speed_link.name: Speed Link
speed_link.text: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

steel_spikes.name: Steel Spikes
steel_spikes.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

thick_fat.name: Thick Fat
thick_fat.text: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from [R] or [W] Pokémon.

thunderclap_flash.name: Thunderclap Flash
thunderclap_flash.text: At the end of your first turn, take a [L] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

ultra_thrusters.name: Ultra Thrusters
ultra_thrusters.text: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Ultra Beast with 1 of your Benched Ultra Beasts.

unruly_claw.name: Unruly Claw
unruly_claw.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

veevee_volve.name: Veevee 'volve
veevee_volve.text: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon. (This Pokémon can't evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.)

vigor_link.name: Vigor Link
vigor_link.text: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less [C] Energy.

volt_charge.name: Volt Charge
volt_charge.text: Once during your turn, you may take a [L] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

wash_out.name: Wash Out
wash_out.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may move a [W] Energy from 1 of your Benched [W] Pokémon to your Active [W] Pokémon.

water_shuriken.name: Water Shuriken
water_shuriken.text: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

wimp_out.name: Wimp Out
wimp_out.text: During your first turn, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
